title: Reset leaver buster
body: riot my leaver buster keeps resetting and saying u have been kicked when im not even in a party with someone{{champion:238}}  i would have finished 3 leaver buster but the thing keeps resetting please fix it and make it two leaver buster thank you for your help.

replies.body: I have this same problem. the timer counts to 5.01 the stops and the game does not load. There is no account of the wait served and remaining ban balance is unchanged. I have reported Bug twice and had no response.  Can't believe this. wow
